title: Kernel PANIC Party
description: Join us at the Kernel Panic Party on April 5th at 7pm sponsored by NTT Security. Come together for the Tech Olympics, Who's Slide Is It Anyways, drinks, and socializing.

extra.heading: Tech Olympics:
bullets: Competitions surrounding technology - think 'Floppy Disk Throw'

extra.heading: Who's Slide Is It Anyways:
bullets: Want to present at Kernelcon, but didn't get time to submit a CFP?  Come to Who's Slide Is It Anyways where we will give you the chance!

But wait! There's a catch. You will be presenting our slides and we will only give you a few minutes to prepare.  Our slides could be awesome 'Phreaky Friday' or super awesome 'How Dwight Schrute Saved my Life'.
